author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
The Steam Deck came out a few years back and changed the face of Linux gaming, and now we're seeing a real competitor to the Steam Deck, not because the ASUS ROG Xbox Ally X is coming out but because of the software it's running and what that means for other handhelds

title: Steam Deck Finally Has Competition And I'm Worried
